p: Perhaps the most significant current limitation of fldgen is that its training data and thus outputs are limited to the annual time scale, while many interesting climatological and biological processes occur at daily or monthly scalesâ€”e.g. with respect to human health [ 18]. An expansion to sub-annual timescales is planned in future work, but appropriately capturing sub-annual ESM internal variability while accounting for the inherent seasonal signals in sub-annual ESM data for many variables is highly non-trivial.
